::: Hell Beast sees the Maximal cruiser on the scope and laughs ::: HA! If 
they think there landing here, they must be suicidal! Black Aracnia, bring 
online the Spacial Defense Systems.

::: Black Aracnia turns around concerned ::: But Hell Beast, we can only use 
those in outter space, not on planetside.

::: Hell Beast ::: Then this will be a test, now wont it? Bring it online!

::: Black Aracnia sighs and types in a few access codes. On the top of the 
Predacon ship, a panel slides open to reveal a missle turrent. It lights up 
and becomes active. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Is the cruiser tageted?

::: Pheniox ::: Yes sir.

::: Hell Beast ::: Fire!

::: The turrent sends out five large missels. Because they were ment to be 
used in Zero Gravity, two of them plummit to the ground and explode, the 
three others make altitude and lock onto the Maximal ship. With swift speed, 
they collide. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Well, it wasnt perfect but if we can get it down we can 
invade and slaughter.
